mapper.insert: insert into db_calculatconfig (ID, PAYPALRATEB, OPER, FINALVALUEFEERATE, 'POSITION', PUBLISHFEE, OPERTIME, SITE, PAYPALRATEL, EXTRAFEEL, EXTRAFEEB) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paypalrateb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalvaluefeerate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{publishfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paypalratel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extrafeel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extrafeeb,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_calculatconfig set PAYPALRATEB = #{paypalrateb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINALVALUEFEERATE = #{finalvaluefeerate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'POSITION' = #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBLISHFEE = #{publishfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYPALRATEL = #{paypalratel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXTRAFEEL = #{extrafeel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXTRAFEEB = #{extrafeeb,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, PAYPALRATEB, OPER, FINALVALUEFEERATE, 'POSITION', PUBLISHFEE, OPERTIME, SITE, PAYPALRATEL, EXTRAFEEL, EXTRAFEEB from db_calculatconfig where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
